summary.description: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'electrocorticographic', 'implanted', 'amplifiers', 'implanted electrocorticographic' | A library of human electrocorticographic data and analyses | A library of human electrocorticographic data and analyses in SearchWorks catalog | Stanford Libraries' official online search tool for books, media, journals, databases, government documents and more | Reporting from: https://searchworks.stanford.edu/view/zk881ps0522 | Electrophysiological data from implanted electrodes in the human brain are rare, and therefore scientific access to it has remained somewhat exclusive
